name: MXDiskWriteExceptionDiagnostic
desc: An object representing a diagnostic report for a disk write exception.

items.name: var totalWritesCaused: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage>
items.desc: The total amount of data written to disk or other long-term storage during the disk write exception.

items.name: var callStackTree: MXCallStackTree
items.desc: The call stack for the disk write exception.
